email Package Reference
Next: 1 Introduction

email Package Reference

Barry Warsaw

barry@python.org

Release 4.0
March 5, 2006

Abstract:

The email package provides classes and utilities to create, parse, generate, and modify email messages, conforming to all the relevant email and MIME related RFCs.
